attributes.action: have Parliament pass a Bill to impose a 100% windfall tax on the £650,000 annual pension being received by Sir Fred Goodwin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Fred Goodwin, after bringing about the near collapse of the Royal Bank of Scotland which led to its bailout with Government money and his forced resignation has retired at age 50 on an enormous undeserved pension.

rejection.details: A similar petition has already been approved and will shortly be live on the site.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
